meaning: Experts predicted that sales would rise.
example: predict'는 (관찰,' '경험,' '과학적' '이유' '등'에 '근거'하여) (미래'의 '일'을) '미리' '선언'하거나 '예측한다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n Analysts predict that the market will continue to grow.

meaning: I prefer tea to coffee.
example: prefer'는 (다른' '것'보다) (어떤' '것'을) '더' '좋아하거나' '선호한다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n Many customers prefer online shopping for its convenience.

meaning: They presented him with an award.
example: present'는 (형용사) (특정' '장소'에) '존재'하거나 '참석'한 '상태'를 '의미'합니다. (명사로 '선물', '현재'라는 '뜻'도 '있'습니다.)\r\n All managers must be present at the mandatory meeting.

meaning: The system processes payments automatically.
example: process'는 (명사) (어떤' '결과'에 '이르기'까지의) '연속적'인 '행동' '단계', '즉' '과정'이나 '절차'를 '의미'합니다. (동사로 '처리하다'는 '뜻'도 '있'습니다.)\r\n The hiring process can take up to four weeks.

meaning: The policy prohibits students from smoking.
example: prohibit'는 (권위'를 '가지고) (어떤' '행동'이나 '물건'을) '법률'이나 '규칙'으로 '엄격'하게 '금지한다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the building.

meaning: Stress can prolong recovery.
example: prolong'은 (시간'이나 '기간'을) '더' '길게' '늘이거나' '연장시킨다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n Any further delays will only prolong the project timeline.

meaning: She was promoted to manager.
example: promote'는 (누군가를) '더' '높은' '직급'으로 '올리다(승진시키다)', '혹은' (제품'이나 '서비스'를) '널리' '알리다(홍보하다)'라는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n Ms. Evans was promoted to Senior Manager last week.

meaning: The plan proved successful.
example: prove'는 (증거'나 '논리'를 '통해) (어떤' '것'이) '사실'이거나 '유효'함'을 '확립'한다는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n This new strategy has proven to be very effective.

meaning: The hotel provides guests with breakfast.
example: provide'는 (필요'하거나 '원하는' '것'을) '쓸' '수' '있도록' '공급'하거나 '이용' '가능'하게 '만든다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n The hotel provides free Wi-Fi for all guests.

meaning: The company publicized its new campaign.
example: publicize'는 (대중'의 '관심'을 '끌기' '위해) (어떤' '것'을) '널리' '알리'거나 '광고'한다는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n We need to publicize the upcoming charity event more effectively.

meaning: The author published a novel.
example: publish'는 (책'이나 '잡지'를) '출판하다'는 '뜻' '외'에, (보고서' '등'의 '정보'를) '공식적'으로 '일반'에 '알린다'는 '의미'로도 '쓰'입니다.\r\n The company will publish its annual report next week.

meaning: We purchased new equipment.
example: purchase'는 (돈'이나 '그에' '상응'하는 '것'을 '지불'하고) '물건'을 '얻는다(구매하다)'는 '의미'의 '동사' '및' '명사'입니다. (buy보다' '격식' '있음)\r\n All purchases over $50 are eligible for free shipping.

meaning: Don’t put off doing your homework.
example: put off'는 (어떤' '일'이나 '약속'을) '나중'으로 '미룬다(postpone)'는 '의미'의 '구동사'입니다.\r\n We had to put off the meeting due to the client's schedule.

meaning: She quoted a line from Shakespeare.
example: quote'는 (동사) '인용하다'는 '뜻' '외'에, (명사) (서비스나' '작업'에 '대한) '예상' '비용', '즉' '견적'을 '의미'하는 '단어'로 '매우' '자주' '쓰'입니다.\r\n The contractor gave us a quote for the renovation work.

meaning: They raised prices last month.
example: raise'는 (물건'이나 '손'을) '위로' '올리다'는 '뜻' '외'에, (가격,' '임금,' '수준' '등'을) '높이다' '혹은' (자금'을) '모으다'는 '의미'로 '쓰'입니다.\r\n The company decided to raise the prices of its main products.

meaning: The city ranks among the safest in the world.
partOfSpeech: 자동/타동 모두 가능. among 구조 중요.
example: rank'는 (명사) '상대적'인 '지위'나 '순위', (동사) (어떤' '것'의) '순위'나 '등급'을 '매긴다'는 '의미'입니다.\r\n Our new product was ranked as the best in its category.

meaning: She retired from the company last year.
example: retire'는 (주로' '나이'가 '들어) '직장' '생활'을 '그만두고' '물러난다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n Mr. Kim will retire next month after 30 years with the company.

meaning: We finally reached an agreement.
example: reach'는 (손'을 '뻗다)라는 '뜻' '외'에, (어떤' '장소'에) '도착하다' '혹은' (전화나' '이메일' '등'으로) '연락'이 '닿다'는 '의미'로 '자주' '쓰'입니다.\r\n You can reach our customer service team by phone or email.

meaning: I can’t recall his name.
example: recall'은 (결함' '등'으로 '인해) (시중'의 '제품'을) '회수'하는 '것(리콜)'을 '의미'하는 '동사'입니다. ('기억해내다'는 '뜻'도 '있'습니다.)`\r\n The company had to recall the product due to a safety defect.

meaning: She received a scholarship.
example: receive'는 (어떤' '것'을) '주'는 '것'을 '받거나' '소유'하게 '된다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n You will receive an email confirmation shortly after ordering.

meaning: He was recognized as a leader.
example: recognize'는 (누군가'나 '무엇'을) '알아보다'는 '뜻' '외'에, (누군가'의 '노력'이나 '공로'를) '공식적'으로 '인정'하고 '포상'한다는 '의미'로 '자주' '쓰'입니다.\r\n The company recognized her hard work with a bonus.

meaning: The firm recruited new employees.
example: recruit'는 (회사나' '조직'에 '필요'한) '새' '구성원'을 '찾아' '뽑는다(모집하다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n We are currently recruiting experienced software developers.

meaning: Please refrain from smoking.
example: refrain'은 (주로' 'refrain' 'from' '형태'로) (어떤' '행동'을) '하고' '싶'은 '것'을 '억누르고' '하지' '않는다(삼가다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n Please refrain from using mobile phones during the presentation.

meaning: The store refunded the money to him.
example: refund'는 (동사) (지불'한 '돈'을) '다시' '돌려준다'는 '의미' '혹은' (명사) '그렇게' '돌려받는' '돈(환불금)'을 '의미'합니다.\r\n If you are not satisfied you can return the item for a full refund.

meaning: She is regarded as a pioneer.
example: regard'는 (명사) '관심'이라는 '뜻'도 '있'지만, (동사, 'regard' 'A' 'as' 'B' '형태'로) (A'를 'B'로) '생각'하거나 '간주한다'는 '의미'로 '자주' '쓰'입니다.\r\n We regard customer safety as our top priority.

meaning: I regret saying that. / We regret to inform you.
example: regret'은 (과거'의 '일'을) '후회하다'는 '뜻' '외'에, (나쁜' '소식'을 '전하게' '되어) '유감'스럽게 '생각한다'는 '의미'로 '자주' '쓰'입니다.\r\n We regret to inform you that the position has been filled.

meaning: The law regulates trade.
example: regulate'는 (규칙'이나 '법률'에 '따라) (어떤' '산업'이나 '활동'을) '관리'하고 '통제한다(규제하다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n The government closely regulates the pharmaceutical industry.

meaning: The company reimbursed him for expenses.
example: reimburse'는 (주로' '업무' '상' '지출'한 '비용'을) (나중'에 '회사' '등'이) '다시' '갚아준다(변제하다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n The company will reimburse you for all travel-related expenses.

meaning: They rejected the proposal.
example: reject'는 (제안,' '지원,' '의견' '등'을) '받아들이'는 '것'을 '거부'하거나 '거절한다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n The proposal was rejected because the costs were too high.

meaning: The story relates to our topic.
example: relate'는 (이야기'를 '들려주다)라는 '뜻'도 '있'지만, (주로' 'be' 'related' 'to' '형태'로) (두' '가지' '이상'의 '것'이) '서로' '연관'이 '있음'을 '나타내는' '동사'입니다.\r\n This issue is directly related to our new shipping policy.

meaning: The company relocated to Busan. / They relocated the office.
example: relocate'는 (회사,' '사무실,' '공장' '등'이) '새로운' '장소'로 '옮기'거나 '이전한다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n Our company headquarters will relocate to Singapore next year.

meaning: Please remove the sticker from the package.
example: remove'는 (어떤' '것'을) '원래' '있던' '장소'에서 '다른' '곳'으로 '옮기'거나 '없앤다(제거하다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n Please remove all personal items from the lockers by Friday.

meaning: You need to renew your license.
example: renew'는 (계약,' '구독,' '면허' '등'의) '유효' '기간'을 '연장'하여 '새롭게' '한다(갱신하다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n You must renew your subscription if you wish to continue the service.
